name: SUPERHIT
description:
You are a Hitman with a target to kill. With your trusty silenced pistol and bouncy bullets, clone yourself to execute your hit in style. This was done in conjunction with the Make-A-Thing game and was completed in 5 days with a team of two.

Team:

Harry OConnor

Luke Wilmot

How to Play:

Movement - WASD

Aim - Mouse

Right Click - Clone Yourself

Left Click - Shoot From Clone
